name: Magic Shortcodes
author: CodeTides

sections.description:
Magic Shortcodes is a very unique and powerful “Shortcode Builder”. You can easily create shortcodes from any HTML/CSS/JS code. You can also style and configure existing shortocdes. All Shortcodes are dynamically generated and you can easily add them to post and pages and there is also a widget available for you to easily add them to widget area.

Live Demo

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
1. Upload magic-shortcodes folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Activated menu can be found in left side menubar.
    4- Add Magic Shortcodes to display in your website.
sections.faq:
From where we can buy pro version? does it includes free supports for any issue or bugs?

You can buy pro version from codecanyon , if you have some suggestion please write back to us.

Does it needs shortcode to display on website?

Yes this plugin does used shortcode to display on websites.

short_description: Convert a complete html or php form with CSS & JS in to a small shortcode that you can use anywhere on your wordpress site.
